name: Mechanical Knight 2
description:
Select one of three robots, fly from planet to planet and save the day!

... Or just take a break from saving the world and try getting hi-score in Colosseum mode.

Content of the game: Joystick support, flying arcade type of stages, platform stages, one-screen arcade type of stages, selection of 3 playable characters, shooting in 8 directions ...
